name: 哈希绿洲 Hash Oasis
description:
Hash Oasis is an immersive social platform that uses the UE4 engine to create a realistic avatar style. Maids, Lolita, JK, and Bunny Girl can customize it according to their preferences. You can roam through numerous 3D scenes, including islands, bars, cinemas, and other rich party gameplay and entertainment activities, and spend unforgettable happy moments with sweet sounding male and female 1v1 play, helping you expand your social circle. Not just a game, but a new world full of possibilities waiting for you to explore, connect, and create.


A picturesque beach party


A bar party with dazzling light and shadow


A shared cinema that spans time and space


An immersive tower defense game


A dreamy and illusory self home
